New Records: Shami took his fifth wicket of the day and 45th at a World Cup, a new record for an Indian player.
Key Match Events: India trashed Sri Lanka by 302 runs after bowling them out for 55 in less than 20 overs.
Dilshan Madushanka took a five-wicket haul for Sri Lanka.
Jasprit Bumrah dismissed Pathum Nissanka lbw with the first ball.
Mohammed Siraj took two wickets in quick succession, leaving Sri Lanka at 2-3.
Mohammed Shami took multiple wickets, including Angelo Mathews, Charith Asalanka, Dushan Hemantha, and Dushmantha Chameera.
Kasun Rajitha scored 14 runs before being caught by Gill.
Madushanka was caught by Shreyas off the bowling of Jadeja, ending Sri Lanka's innings at 55 all out.
Miscellaneous Highlights: India booked a semi-final spot in the Cricket World Cup with this win.
Sri Lanka is all but eliminated from the tournament after a fifth defeat from seven matches.
